mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_master (user_id, user_pw, user_nm, user_home, user_phone, user_email, birth_ymd, zipcode, addr, addr_detail) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nm}, #{user_home}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{birth_ymd}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_pw, user_nm FROM user_master WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
